channel.title: Posts on Keep It Simple Stupid
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Keep It Simple Stupid

item.title: Goal Setting for 2020
item.description: In 2013, I left Canada for a new life in Japan. I brought a laptop and a couple of pairs of clothes with me. I didn't speak the language and had no job lined up. Because I had saved up some money, gotten my bachelor's degree, and had the right work experience I was able to find a job. It wasn't a spontaneous decision to move to Japan. I loved Japan and had been planning most of my early 20's on how to move there.
